TopicTitle: What Are Things You've Heard That Made You Facepalm?

I was just in a drafting class and the teacher spent nearly half an hour explaining isometric and orthographic views to the students. Why not give a quick 5 minute explanation? The majority of the time, he was just explaining the X, Y and Z axis and only began *calling* them X, Y, and Z after that half an hour.

In the barracks we had a game we called "Power Uno" where we would take two decks of UNO cards. The only change in rules was if someone played a draw two card, the person it was aimed against could play their draw two card and then if the next person couldn't play a draw two card, they'd have to draw the total number of cards (4). It's fun if you've gone around the table a couple of times and the poor schmuck ends up drawing 16 cards...!
